name: Filthy Rich - Money isn't evil
description:
Filthy Rich is an incremental clicking simulation of running a business.

In this game, you assume the role of an entrepreneur building a start-up from scratch all the way up to a financial empire.

【FEATURES】

Hire Elite, Precision Investment to Strike It Rich Overnight
Choose from Superstar, luminaries with political clout, famous businessman, as well as other elites and celebrities to grow your enterprise and dominate Wall Street!

Lovely Secretaries
No successful businessman can be without attractive administrative assistants! Pick from a bevy of gorgeous ladies, each with their own unique style, to accompany you to social functions, parties, red-carpet galas, and other high-society events.

Set Up Diverse Operations and Create Your Business Empire
Invest, negotiate, contract-signing, form partnerships, acquire and bid your way to the top! Build and expand a small op, then test your business acumen in other fields, until finally entrenching a top global empire that encompasses retail, real estate, and mining. Easy gameplay, diverse modes, sensical quests, and intense Trade Wars all served to fulfill your fantasy of running a big-time business.

Rolling in Dough Means and Spending Money Like Water
Spend millions almost as fast as you make it, just tap your way to gazillions in net worth! Experience the life of the rich and famous, from luxurious cars to lavish mansions, expensive watches, fine clothes, and anything else befitting the top 1%. Yet, the best is still ahead as you make it rain!

If you’re interested, please follow our official fan page for the latest information!
